label: 輪台
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: (Luntai). A court dance named for a place in the western region," i.e., countries to the west of China. It was usually paired with "Seigaiha." [青海波][HW:  also read Rintai and Seikaiha]"
